channel.title: Java Help with my CMD file
channel.description:
ok.. im good at Java and all.. got a 508 HD Client .. its nicely done.. heres my run.cmd [code]@echo off Title DesolationScapes 508 HD Client Color 0a cd 508 HD Client\ "C:\program files\java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -splash:splash.png loader pause[/code]
ok.. thats SUPPOSED to bring up a little splash screen of a pic i put in my client along with the client.. so far all it brings up is the client.. and on the cmd prompt i get just a list of java usages..
can someone help me with the -splash part? :/ not understanding the thing atm :(

item.title: Java Help with my CMD file
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

… u dont need a splash method dumbas-… splash is programmed into JRE6… using the -splash: thingy… soo… i dont think a splash method is needed

Read full topic
item.source: Java Help with my CMD file

item.title: Java Help with my CMD file
item.dc:creator: @Sir_John Sir John
item.description:
@Sir_John wrote:

Do you even have a splash method if you don’t it doesn’t even know what a splash is.

Read full topic

@echo off Title DesolationScapes 508 HD Client Color 0a cd 508 HD Client\ "C:\program files\java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -splash:splash.png loader pause
